President Bush administration, Donald Rumsfeld was at odds with Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell about Iraq. The differences weren't personal, Donald Rumsfeld said. He recalled receiving a book that Henry Kissinger had written, with the inscription, To an occasional adversary and a permanent friend. `` When I started working on the book, Henry Kissinger said,` You tell it like it was.' We differed on some issues, and there's nothing wrong with that. It was professional

me the whole time,'' Allen Iverson said http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

ecosystem,'' acknowledging that competing with Apple's iOS and Google's Android involves a partnership that must encompass phones, developers, mobile services, partnerships with carriers, and app stores to distribute software. There are other mobile ecosystems. We will disrupt them. There will be challenges. We will overcome them. Success requires speed. We will be swift, Stephen Elop and Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer said in a boldly worded open letter.`` Together, we see the opportunity, and we have the will, the resources and the drive to succeed.'' who invest in U.S. Treasury bonds.`` It's an IOU that is backed by Treasury bonds and the faith and credit of the United States government,'' said Barack Obama Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt. It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor. It's basically going to be my rookie season again. It hurts, but I turn the TV on, I read the paper, I listen to some of the things people say about me having the season that I had last year and me losing a step, things like that. They're trying to put me in a rocking chair already. The Grizzlies announced they had signed the 10-time All Star on Thursday morning minutes before Allen Iverson was introduced at a news conference.
